########################################################################
# Include python install macros
########################################################################
include(GrPython)
if(NOT PYTHONINTERP_FOUND)
    return()
endif()

add_subdirectory(bindings)

########################################################################
# Install python sources
########################################################################
GR_PYTHON_INSTALL(
    FILES
    __init__.py
    shift_phase_multiple_hier.py
    calc_phase_diff_multiple_hier.py
    DESTINATION ${GR_PYTHON_DIR}/gnuradio/aoa
)

########################################################################
# Handle the unit tests
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

set(GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-aoa)

# Create a package directory that tests can import. It includes everything
# from `python/`.
add_custom_target(
  copy_module_for_tests ALL
  COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_directory ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
          ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/test_modules/gnuradio/aoa/
)

GR_ADD_TEST(qa_MUSIC_lin_array ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_MUSIC_lin_array.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_rootMUSIC_linear_array ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_rootMUSIC_linear_array.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_shift_phase ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_shift_phase.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_calc_phase_diff ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_calc_phase_diff.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_shift_phase_multiple_hier ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_shift_phase_multiple_hier.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_calc_phase_diff_multiple_hier ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_calc_phase_diff_multiple_hier.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_precise_moving_average ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_precise_moving_average.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_head_w_rst ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_head_w_rst.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_correlate ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_correlate.py)
